website_summaries.verdict: Lessen the look of deep wrinkles with this soft cream that combines benefits of serum and lotion.
pros: Won't erase time, but this lotion can help diminish the toll it takes
Gentle yet highly effective in terms of adding a bit of plumpness where it's needed most
Men notice improved results in skin elasticity as well
cons: Some claims that results aren't apparent

customer_reviews.title: Face moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this for me one year for my bday . The lady told her it was the no 1 seller . I thought it was overpriced . But I have to admit it was worth it. I looked like one of my daughters instead of their mother. Recommend but one for myself for my bday this year
customer_reviews.author: Gisele blount

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing but I don't know about anti-wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: I don't have heavy lines yet being in my mid-20s but I do have some faint laugh/smile lines around my eyes. I've been using this every night for about 6 weeks now I believe and it is definitely very moisturizing without being greasy or heavy but I really haven't noticed any improvement to the few fine lines I have. It seems to plump the skin slightly so I suppose those with heavier or more wrinkles may notice better results on that front but for me it just seems like a very basic, if nice moisturizing cream. It's okay, and my skin doesn't dislike it, so I'll use the jar. But I'll stick with my Tret cream for actual anti-aging products.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S.

customer_reviews.title: Straightforward results
customer_reviews.text: Even some high end beauty brands can be a frustrating mystery finding out which ingredients are included. Philosophy is right up front with its ingredients list and we respect that. However, my wife prefers a more natural mix of ingredients than this line offers. Philosophy’s Anti-Wrinkle Miracle Worker Night Cream features a typical group of humectants and polymers from the science lab. Its attributes include: unscented, pleasant, easy to apply and comfortable overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful night lotion.
customer_reviews.text: philosophy’s night cream comes in a glass jar with a screw off lid. The lotion is thick and rich. It has no fragrance. The lotion goes onto my skin smoothly and a little bit goes a long way. It absorbs into my skin quickly and doesn’t feel greasy or oily. It keeps my skin nicely moisturized throughout the night and I wake up with a nice glow. I had no bad reactions from the lotion or rashes. All in all... a great night lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Pantliano

customer_reviews.title: Very thick
customer_reviews.text: This product took over a month to arrive, but I finally received it about a week ago. It is extremely thick and does seem to work....but....yep, there is a but. There is a strange residue on my face in the morning. It is almost a fiber like residue. The product is extremely thick, almost to the point of being uncomfortable. I am not sure if this is how the product is manufactured, or if it is a result of the long shipping time.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a stellar moisturizer to put on before bed and this is perfect for me! It's got a great scent, feels good on my face, and after using faithfully for a few weeks I'm noticing a big difference with my skin. It looks brighter and more even. I'm in my early thirties and I can't say I have many wrinkles, but if this can prevent it I'm here for it! I'll definitely buy a new one of these when this runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Baldwin BBU

customer_reviews.title: Feels comforting at end of day
customer_reviews.text: This cream feels so good to put on my face after doing my evening cleaning routine. Especially if I've really scrubbed and toned, this cream soothes my tired skin and makes it feel and look rejuvenated. The cream is thick but spreads on easily... you don't need much at all. Skin immediately feels relaxed and looks brighter. Wrinkles are reduced. Cream has a very light fresh scent that is pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin so creams are touch-and-go for me. This formula is not too thick and it makes my skin feel soft and smooth, especially now that the Santa Ana winds are hitting Southern California. My skin has been looking a little tired lately (work stress), but not when I wear this! The price seems a little steep if you haven't used a night cream before, but a little goes a LONG way with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Villarruel-Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This face cream is great both at night and even in the morning. It does not cause any irritation or adverse effect, it does not get into or sting my eyes. It absorbs quickly, and I have not experienced any breakouts as a result of using this product. I have been using it for almost a week and so far my skin looks very good and is well moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cream that I love and that has given me noticeable results
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of philosophy and of their products and the fact they are pure. I love this night cream it’s creamy and smooth cooling and so hydrating. I loved it before I applied it to my face. The fact that is natural free of unnecessary chemicals makes it my new go to night moisture cream. Bravo 👏 philosophy.. great product
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for three days now and it seems good. My skin feels more tight after a few hours and it feels great in the morning. I will update after a couple of weeks. Good!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this cream. It has improved my texture and made my skin really soft. It isn't oily and it will not make you break out. I have combination oily to dry skin and an Olive complexion.
customer_reviews.author: AmazingBeans

customer_reviews.title: My First Impression
customer_reviews.text: 1. Odorless. 2. Very creamy 3. After two weeks, no miracle has occurred.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: philosophy anti-wrinkle miracle worker night cream, 2 oz
product_meta.description:
philosophy's overnight cream helps virtually erase the look of fine lines as you sleep, while recharging skin and helping counteract the signs of stress on your skin. a powerhouse wrinkle-fighting complex of peptides, hyaluronic acid, indian gentian extract and potent forms of vitamin c an innovative complex of saponins and enhanced hyaluronic acid to help counteract stress-induced damage on skin.

BRAND STORY
Through effective skincare formulas and fresh scents, philosophy brings beauty to the body and the mind. Cristina Carlino, the brains behind philosophy, uses cutting-edge research to create philosophy's effective formulations.
